title: imPROMPTu
description:
🎬✨Welcome to Impromptu – Where Creativity Meets AI Magic! ✨🎬

Are you ready to unlock your prompting potential and bring your wildest ideas to life? 🚀💡 At Impromptu, you'll get the stage to show off your storytelling skills, using Gen AI tools to transform your imagination into reality. 🌟

  • Round 1: Craft a stunning script based on a storyline or subject we provide. 📝 The more creative and prompt-driven you are, the better your chances of standing out! ⏳ Time is fixed, so bring your A-game!

  • Round 2: Use AI magic to turn your script into jaw-dropping images! 🤖 The key is in the quality of your prompts and your creativity.

  • Round 3: The Final Showdown! Present your storyboard using your script and AI-generated images.It’s time to wow the audience and clinch the title🏆🎉

    • This is your chance to step into the future of creativity! 💥 So what are you waiting for? Let your prompts do the talking!!!

    Guidelines
  • Participate in teams of 1 to 2.
  • Lab computers will be allotted. You are free to bring your laptops.
  • Any AI tools can be used during the event. Decision of the judges is final.
